alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 11:44AM MST until December 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MST /3 AM CST/ TO 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Kit Carson County. In Kansas, Cheyenne and Sherman Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM MST /3 AM CST/ to 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
